2565.86.text:

And that's the funny
thing about experiences.

2578.45.text:
If you buy an experience,
and it's really bad,

2583.97.text:
So my advice to you would be
shift from material things

It has a lot of other

I wish I mentioned the bread

you don't have to

I hadn't talked about

2781.74.text:
compared to right

And for someone who's

2789.98.text:
that your signs get

Stuffication is a

Scarcity-- not having enough--

2804.92.text:
And I'm not saying this

2812.36.text:
that we have per capita,

If you get to the point where

Because I'd say that is an

2848.14.text:
an element of the material

being a first level

2854.49.text:

2857.36.text:

2862.64.text:
In terms of how you

2864.90.text:
So if you buy material
good for yourself--

2869.25.text:
So I'm not trying to show off

the bread maker because we

2874.97.text:
discussed it and
we think we will

2878.15.text:
And fresh bread is really

2881.77.text:
I don't want to fixate

2883.56.text: But we the decision for us.

2885.11.text:
We're not doing as an extrinsic
thing to say, hey, look at us,

2889.80.text:
And it can be the with
same with experiences.

2891.67.text:
You know those
people who will go

2893.29.text: to the place to go on holiday.

They'll read a magazine and
go that's the place I have

2897.63.text:
to go on holiday
because then I can

2901.62.text:
You all have friends like

You don't get as

2906.93.text:
buy that experiential good
for an extrinsic reason,

2910.79.text:
than if you buy it for
an intrinsic reason.

2913.07.text:
But-- and this is why I like
the distinction between material

2917.10.text:
and experiential

2919.72.text:

2924.73.text:

2927.69.text:
you'll still be

And I don't think

3015.67.text:
And I agree with you that

what you do with

More people living in

think the most important part

3138.63.text:

So when the Industrial

3143.18.text:
this guy in the north of England

3150.88.text:
Apparently, if you look

3152.96.text:
but he became their
hero and they and they

3154.71.text:
called themselves Luddites

3157.22.text:

Because it was the

3167.69.text:

that gave us everything

And definitely be changes

3180.51.text:
And I think it will

3D printing going to do for all

When you can 3D

it's going to completely

3196.21.text:
plastic goods, when you

So the world is

And what I'm hoping-- this is

3208.10.text:

3211.35.text:
was just revolutionized them

3214.12.text:

We could end up in
